sentence.Network_en: He tried to profiteer from this dirty deal.

sentence.Network_en: You have called me a Iiar and a thief and a war profiteer!
sentence.Network_cn: 你说我是个骗子,小偷,发战争财!

sentence.Network_en: What we want is an user, I can profiteer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要的是用户, 我未来能赚大钱.

entry.tran: 奸商；投机商；牟取暴利的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a profiteer, you are critical of them because they make large profits by charging high prices for goods that are hard to get.

example.ex: ...a new social class composed largely of war profiteers and gangsters.
example.tran: 主要由战争投机商和强盗组成的新的社会阶层

means.word_mean: 1. someone who makes excessive profit (especially on goods in short supply)
1. make an unreasonable profit, as on the sale of difficult to obtain goods
